category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: REQ_CompareSpecificationHistory
preference.preference_description:
Controls if the user can compare the Requirement Specification history in Active Workspace client. The default value is true. To view the Requirement Specification history, "REQ_Microservice_Installed" also needs to be set to true.
Valid Values: * true: User will be able to see Requirement Specification history. * false: User will not be able to see Requirement Specification history.
